languages.text: "Я — делец, шерин. Мы извлекаем выгоду из всего, такова наша натура. Чувствуя запах крови, пустынный лев ест, даже если сыт. Ведь кто знает, когда случится следующая трапеза. А еще... Это так мило, когда девушке дарят подарки". {n}Джай опускает смущенный взгляд к полу.{/n}

"I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я — делец, шерин. Мы извлекаем выгоду из всего, такова наша натура. Чувствуя запах крови, пустынный лев ест, даже если сыт. Ведь кто знает, когда случится следующая трапеза. А еще... Это так мило, когда девушке дарят подарки". {n}Джай опускает смущенный взгляд к полу.{/n}

For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

languages.text: “我是个生意人，亲爱的。我喜欢从一切事物中攫取利益，这是我的天性。当沙漠中的狮子闻到血腥味时，就算已经吃饱了，也会再次大快朵颐。毕竟，谁知道下次盛宴什么时候才会来呢？再说……哪个女孩子家不喜欢收到礼物呢？”{n}婕伊低下了头，羞愧地看着地板。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是个生意人，亲爱的。我喜欢从一切事物中攫取利益，这是我的天性。当沙漠中的狮子闻到血腥味时，就算已经吃饱了，也会再次大快朵颐。毕竟，谁知道下次盛宴什么时候才会来呢？再说……哪个女孩子家不喜欢收到礼物呢？”{n}婕伊低下了头，羞愧地看着地板。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしは商売人よ、シャリーン。あらゆるものから利益を引き出す…それがあたしの性分なの。砂漠の獅子は、血の匂いを嗅ぎつければ、お腹が一杯でも食事をする。次のごちそうがいつ来るかわからないからね。それに…贈り物をもらうのが嫌いな女の子なんて要ると思う？」{n}ジェイは、きまり悪そうに床に視線を落とす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは商売人よ、シャリーン。あらゆるものから利益を引き出す…それがあたしの性分なの。砂漠の獅子は、血の匂いを嗅ぎつければ、お腹が一杯でも食事をする。次のごちそうがいつ来るかわからないからね。それに…贈り物をもらうのが嫌いな女の子なんて要ると思う？」{n}ジェイは、きまり悪そうに床に視線を落とす。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Soy una mujer de negocios, shereen. Saco tajada en todo, lo llevo en la sangre. Cuando un león del desierto huele sangre, come aunque tenga el estómago lleno. ¿Quién sabe cuándo llegará el siguiente banquete? Además... ¿a qué chica no le gusta recibir regalos?». {n}Jae mira al suelo, pero sin vergüenza alguna.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Soy una mujer de negocios, shereen. Saco tajada en todo, lo llevo en la sangre. Cuando un león del desierto huele sangre, come aunque tenga el estómago lleno. ¿Quién sabe cuándo llegará el siguiente banquete? Además... ¿a qué chica no le gusta recibir regalos?». {n}Jae mira al suelo, pero sin vergüenza alguna.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis une femme d'affaires, shereen. Je tire profit de tout ce qui m'entoure, c'est dans ma nature. Quand un lion du désert flaire l'odeur du sang, il mange même s'il a la panse déjà pleine, car il ignore quand viendra son prochain repas. Et puis... vous connaissez des femmes qui n'aiment pas les cadeaux, vous ? » {n}Jae baisse les yeux vers le sol, l'air gêné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis une femme d'affaires, shereen. Je tire profit de tout ce qui m'entoure, c'est dans ma nature. Quand un lion du désert flaire l'odeur du sang, il mange même s'il a la panse déjà pleine, car il ignore quand viendra son prochain repas. Et puis... vous connaissez des femmes qui n'aiment pas les cadeaux, vous ? » {n}Jae baisse les yeux vers le sol, l'air gêné.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin eine Geschäftsfrau, Shereen. Ich ziehe aus allem Profit – das liegt in meiner Natur. Wenn ein Wüstenlöwe Blut wittert, frisst er weiter, auch mit vollem Bauch. Denn wer weiß schon, wann nächstes Mal Gelegenheit dazu ist. Und außerdem ... welches Mädchen bekommt nicht gerne Geschenke?" {n}Jae neigt beschämt den Kopf Richtung Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin eine Geschäftsfrau, Shereen. Ich ziehe aus allem Profit – das liegt in meiner Natur. Wenn ein Wüstenlöwe Blut wittert, frisst er weiter, auch mit vollem Bauch. Denn wer weiß schon, wann nächstes Mal Gelegenheit dazu ist. Und außerdem ... welches Mädchen bekommt nicht gerne Geschenke?" {n}Jae neigt beschämt den Kopf Richtung Boden.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ben bir iş kadınıyım şirinim. Her şeyden kendime kâr çıkarırım. Bu benim doğamda var. Bir çöl aslanı, kanın kokusunu aldığında karnı tok olsa bile yiyeceğini yer. Bir sonraki ziyafetin ne zaman karşısına çıkacağını bilemez sonuçta. Ayrıca... Hangi kız hediye almaktan hoşlanmaz ki?" {n}Jae, utanmış bakışlarını yere indiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a businesswoman, shereen. I extract profit from everything — it's in my nature. When a desert lion catches the scent of blood, he will eat even if his belly is full. For who knows when the next feast will come. And besides... what girl doesn't like receiving gifts?" {n}Jae lowers her abashed gaze to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben bir iş kadınıyım şirinim. Her şeyden kendime kâr çıkarırım. Bu benim doğamda var. Bir çöl aslanı kanın kokusunu aldığında, karnı tok olsa bile yiyeceğini yiyecektir. Bir sonraki ziyafetin ne zaman karşısına çıkacağını bilemez sonuçta. Ve ayrıca... Hangi kız hediye almaktan hoşlanmaz ki?" {n}Jae utanmış bakışlarını yere indiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
